# The `ScopedDbgInfoFormatSetter` Class Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Used to temporarily set the debug info format of a function, module, or basic block for the duration of this object&#39;s lifetime, after which the prior state will be restored. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

class llvm::ScopedDbgInfoFormatSetter&lt;T&gt;</CodeBlock>
